com.sensoro.beacon.kit

类 SensoroBeaconConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sensoro.beacon.kit.SensoroBeaconConnection

  • public class SensoroBeaconConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    The class of the beacon connection.

    • 嵌套类概要

      限定符和类型 类和说明

      The callback interface of the beacon.

      The exception of the SDK.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void connect()
      Connect the beacon.The callback SensoroBeaconConnection.BeaconConnectionCallback.onConnectedState(Beacon, int, int) will be called.
      void disableAliBeacon()
      Disable AliBeacon function of SmartBeacon-4AA.
      void disableBackgroundEnhancement()
      Disable background enhancement function of SmartBeacon-4AA.
      void disableIBeacon()
      Disable iBeacon function of Yunzi.
      void disablePassword()
      Disabled the password of the beacon.
      void disconnect()
      Disconnect the beacon.
      void enableAliBeacon()
      Enable AliBeacon function of SmartBeacon-4AA.
      void enableBackgroundEnhancement()
      Enable background enhancement function of SmartBeacon-4AA.
      void enableIBeacon()
      Enable iBeacon function of Yunzi.
      void flashLightWitCommand(byte repeat, byte repeatCount)
      Flash light of Yunzi major and minor of this beacon.
      boolean isConnected()
      Return the status whether the beacon is connected or not.
      void reloadSensorData()
      Reload the sensor data.Force to reload the sensoro data.
      void requireWritePermission(byte[] password)
      Check the password with bytes.If the beacon has the password,you must check the password one time at first before other operations.
      void requireWritePermission(java.lang.String password)
      Check the password.If the beacon has the password,you must check the password one time at first before other operations.
      void resetAccelerometerCount()
      Reset the count of the acceleration sensor.

      Reset to factory.

      Modify the base settings of the beacon.

      Set the major and minor of the beacon.
      void writePassword(byte[] password)
      Set a new password of the beacon with bytes.If you set the new password successfully,you must check the password one time before other operations after connecting successfully.

      Set a new password of the beacon.If you set the new password successfully,you must check the password one time before other operations after connecting successfully.

      Set the UUID of the beacon.

      Write the secure broadcast interval of the beacon.

      Modify the sensor settings of the beacon.

    • 方法详细资料

      • connect

        public void connect()
        Connect the beacon.The callback SensoroBeaconConnection.BeaconConnectionCallback.onConnectedState(Beacon, int, int) will be called.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect the beacon.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Return the status whether the beacon is connected or not.

      • resetToFactorySettings

        public void resetToFactorySettings()
        Reset to factory.

      • resetAccelerometerCount

        public void resetAccelerometerCount()
        Reset the count of the acceleration sensor.

      • writePassword

        public void writePassword(java.lang.String password)
        Set a new password of the beacon.If you set the new password successfully,you must check the password one time before other operations after connecting successfully.
        参数:
        password - new password.

      • writePassword

        public void writePassword(byte[] password)
        Set a new password of the beacon with bytes.If you set the new password successfully,you must check the password one time before other operations after connecting successfully.
        参数:
        password - new password.

      • disablePassword

        public void disablePassword()
        Disabled the password of the beacon.

      • requireWritePermission

        public void requireWritePermission(java.lang.String password)
        Check the password.If the beacon has the password,you must check the password one time at first before other operations.
        参数:
        password - the password to check.

      • requireWritePermission

        public void requireWritePermission(byte[] password)
        Check the password with bytes.If the beacon has the password,you must check the password one time at first before other operations.
        参数:
        password - the password to check.

      • writeBaseSettings

        public void writeBaseSettings(BaseSettings baseSetttings)
        Modify the base settings of the beacon.
        参数:
        baseSetttings - The base settings to set.

      • writeSensorSettings

        public void writeSensorSettings(SensorSettings sensorSettings)
        Modify the sensor settings of the beacon.
        参数:
        sensorSettings - The sensor settings to set.

      • writeProximityUUID

        public void writeProximityUUID(java.lang.String proximityUuid)
        Set the UUID of the beacon.
        参数:
        proximityUuid - The UUID to set.

        (format:"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000")

      • writeMajorMinor

        public void writeMajorMinor(int major,
                   int minor)
        Set the major and minor of the beacon.
        参数:
        major - (range:0~65535)
        minor - (range:0~65535)

      • reloadSensorData

        public void reloadSensorData()
        Reload the sensor data.Force to reload the sensoro data.

      • disableIBeacon

        public void disableIBeacon()
        Disable iBeacon function of Yunzi.
        Added from SDK_VERION SensoroBeaconManager.SDK_VERSION 3.0.0, only support B0-3.0,C0-3.0,C0-3.1 and above.

      • enableIBeacon

        public void enableIBeacon()
        Enable iBeacon function of Yunzi.
        Added from SDK_VERION SensoroBeaconManager.SDK_VERSION 3.0.0, only support B0-3.0,C0-3.0,C0-3.1 and above.

      • enableAliBeacon

        public void enableAliBeacon()
        Enable AliBeacon function of SmartBeacon-4AA.
        Only support C0-3.1 and above.

      • disableAliBeacon

        public void disableAliBeacon()
        Disable AliBeacon function of SmartBeacon-4AA.
        Only support C0-3.1 and above.

      • enableBackgroundEnhancement

        public void enableBackgroundEnhancement()
        Enable background enhancement function of SmartBeacon-4AA.
        Only support C0-3.1 and above.

      • disableBackgroundEnhancement

        public void disableBackgroundEnhancement()
        Disable background enhancement function of SmartBeacon-4AA.
        Only support C0-3.1 and above.

      • writeBroadcastKey

        public void writeBroadcastKey(java.lang.String broadcastKey)
        Write the broadcast key of Yunzi.
        Added from SDK_VERION SensoroBeaconManager.SDK_VERSION 3.0.0, only support B0-3.0,C0-3.0,C0-3.1 and above.
        参数:
        broadcastKey - The value of broadcast key.

      • writeSecureBroadcastInterval

        public void writeSecureBroadcastInterval(SecureBroadcastInterval secureBroadcastInterval)
        Write the secure broadcast interval of the beacon.
        SecureBroadcastInterval.DISABLED only effect on B0-2.3.
        参数:
        secureBroadcastInterval - The value of SecureBroadcastInterval .

      • flashLightWitCommand

        public void flashLightWitCommand(byte repeat,
                        byte repeatCount)
        Flash light of Yunzi major and minor of this beacon. This method only supports C0-3.1 and above.
        参数:
        repeat - If the bit of command is 1, then this light will turn on one times, if 0 ,the light turn off. you can use custom command, or use SensorSettings.FlashLightCommand
        repeatCount - The count that command was repeat.
